page.title: 17Clubs and Societies.
page.content:
Many of the childrenand their parents belong to local clubs and societies.
WARNACT is the WAwickshire NAture Conservation Trust. The school has a Wildlife Club which is connected to the Trust. The school also has a Parent's and Teacher's Association. (P.T.A.) This supports the school with fund raising activities and provides an opportunity for parents to find out more of the schools activities through workshops and social events. The Women's Institute is very active in the area. There are allotment associations in both Moreton Morrell and Ashorne.The later also hasland divided into smallholdings. Ashorne has a Cricket Club which plays weekly through the season.
